results.title: Reduced lactic acidosis risk with Imeglimin: Comparison with Metformin
results.text_hl: Ex vivo measurements revealed higher @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_complex_I_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537475 @@@mitochondrial complex I@@@ inhibition with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ versus slight effects with @CHEMICAL_imeglimin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C575881 @@@Imeglimin@@@.

citations.NLM: Theurey P, Vial G, Fontaine E, Monternier PA, Fouqueray P, Bolze S, Moller DE, Hallakou-Bozec S. Reduced lactic acidosis risk with Imeglimin: Comparison with Metformin Physiol Rep. 2022 Mar;10(5):e15151. PMID: 35274817

results.title: Hallmark Molecular and Pathological Features of POLG Disease are Recapitulated in Cerebral Organoids.
results.text_hl: Significant dysregulation is also identified in pathways crucial for neuronal development and function, alongside upregulated NOTCH and JAK-STAT signaling pathways. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment ameliorated many of these abnormalities, except for the persistent affliction of inhibitory @CHEMICAL_Dopamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004298 @@@dopamine@@@-@CHEMICAL_Glutamic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018698 @@@glutamate@@@ (DA GLU) neurons.

citations.NLM: Chen A, Yangzom T, Hong Y, Lundberg BC, Sullivan GJ, Tzoulis C, Bindoff LA, Liang KX. Hallmark Molecular and Pathological Features of POLG Disease are Recapitulated in Cerebral Organoids. Adv Sci (Weinh). 2024 Mar 6;():e2307136. PMID: 38445970

results.title: Pancreatic mitochondrial complex I exhibits aberrant hyperactivity in diabetes
results.text_hl: Moreover, when the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were treated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for 4 weeks (150 mg/kg, one IP injection per day), @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_complex_I_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537475 @@@complex I hyperactivity@@@ was remarkably decreased (Fig. 3D).

citations.NLM: Wu J, Luo X, Thangthaeng N, Sumien N, Chen Z, Rutledge MA, Jing S, Forster MJ, Yan LJ. Pancreatic mitochondrial complex I exhibits aberrant hyperactivity in diabetes  Biochem Biophys Rep. 2017 Sep;11():119-129. PMID: 28868496

results.title: Intracerebroventricular metformin decreases body weight but has pro-oxidant effects and decreases survival.
results.text_hl: The precise molecular target of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ is unknown; however, several reports have shown an inhibitory effect on mitochondrial @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_complex_I_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537475 @@@complex I of@@@ the electron transport chain (ETC), which is a related site for @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@reactive oxygen species@@@ production.

citations.NLM: Portela LV, Gnoatto J, Brochier AW, Haas CB, de Assis AM, de Carvalho AK, Hansel G, Zimmer ER, Oses JP, Muller AP. Intracerebroventricular metformin decreases body weight but has pro-oxidant effects and decreases survival. Neurochem Res. 2015 Mar;40(3):514-23. PMID: 25492133

results.title: SIRT3 aggravates metformin-induced energy stress and apoptosis in ovarian cancer cells.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ interrupted cellular energy metabolism mainly by causing @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_complex_I_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537475 @@@damage to complex I@@@ that impacted mitochondrial function.

citations.NLM: Wu Y, Gao WN, Xue YN, Zhang LC, Zhang JJ, Lu SY, Yan XY, Yu HM, Su J, Sun LK. SIRT3 aggravates metformin-induced energy stress and apoptosis in ovarian cancer cells. Exp Cell Res. 2018 Jun 15;367(2):137-149. PMID: 29580688

results.title: Metformin-Induced Mitochondrial Complex I Inhibition: Facts, Uncertainties, and Consequences
results.text_hl: Fourthly, using radioactive [@CHEMICAL_Carbon_14 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000615234 @@@14C@@@] @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, the radioactivity was not found to accumulate in liver mitochondria of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ treated orally with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and no radioactivity was measured inside mitochondria when @SPECIES_8355 @@@Xenopus laevis@@@ oocytes were exposed to concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ that led to @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_complex_I_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537475 @@@Complex I@@@ inhibition.

citations.NLM: Fontaine E. Metformin-Induced Mitochondrial Complex I Inhibition: Facts, Uncertainties, and Consequences Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2018;9():753. PMID: 30619086
